transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Mr. Shahab baat kar rahe hai Divyanshi Tech side mission se jo hai?
Customer: Bolo na madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir very good afternoon main IndiaMART Noida office se baat kar rahi hu recording line se actually sir aapka ek concern aaya tha video meeting ke related ki aapko video meeting join karna hai.
Customer: Wo ticket main band kar diya tha. Close kar diya.
Executive: Matlab abhi aap nahi chah rahe hai abhi video meeting join karna?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: And sir ek cheez aur tha yaha pe na ki aapke na do buyer ke conflict chal rahe hai sir kaafi purane hai na abhi ek aapka 11 October 2025 ka conflict hai sir aur ek 25 November ka aapka conflict hai jo ki resolve nahi hue hai sir to aap bataye sir ki kya problem aa rahi hai ye conflict aapke resolve kiske liye matlab ek ek jo 11 11 October wala jo client hai na wo client ek dam se shaitan hai theek hai uska koi problem aisa hai nahi madam.
Customer: Wo client hi hai matlab muh se gaali nikalta hai hum log thoda language tough hai wo jabardasti ka material usko dispatch ho gaya hai password sirf nahi mila hai main bola hu ki madam thoda din lagega de dunga kuch payment wement bhi baki hai to apna concern se wo payment bhej nahi rahi hai to main bhi password bhej nahi raha hu ab is chakkar mein IndiaMART ko complaint kar diya aur IndiaMART wale log kal parso se mera service bhi hold kar diya to kya jarurat hai IndiaMART ka service chala.
Executive: Sir dekhiye.
Customer: Man liye sirf buyer ka dekh kar ke agar service ko hold kiya jaye tab to ho gaya fir to main bhi apna evidence de deta hu na mera quotation dekh kar ke to pata chal jayega ki kya issue hai nahi hai material already dispatch hai ek material delivered bhi hai install bhi ho gaya sirf password paisa ke karan ruka hua hai to isme dealer ka kya problem hai?
Executive: Sir dekhiye main aapki baato se bilkul sehmat hu lekin sir aapka jo concern hai jo 11 matlab aur jo 25 aur jo 25 tarikh ka matlab parso tarso wala customer ka hai uska koi issue nahi hai uska sara cheez delivered hai usme bhi sirf payment ka masla hai machine bhi deliver hai machine chal bhi rahi hai aur man lijiye usme ek attachment lagana hai jiska wo payment thoda sa due hai bas isliye wo attachment lagani hai wo Tuesday Wednesday ko sort out ho jayega ye mera close matlab local party ka hai.
Customer: Sir dekhiye jaise ye abhi jo main aapka October wala complaint bata rahi hu isme ye tha ki I had a book the machine unhone bola ki 16 August mein unhone machine book kari thi aur wo deliver late hua unko 19 September ko uske baad aapke behavior ko leke unhone kuch complaint dali hai ki rude behavior hai aur unhone ye bhi dala ki aapne usko install nahi kiya hai to nahi nahi machine already install to unse puchna chahiye na ki machine install nahi hua to fir ye photo video daliye khud ba khud pata chal jayega na sir without inspection aap log close kar dete hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm. Sir sahi baat hai but sir aapse request mera ye hai ki pehli cheez ye aapka long running jo complaint hai agar aapki taraf se sab kuch ho gaya hai to aap confirmation provide kar dijiye hamari legal team ko plus mein buyer se coordinate kar lijiye yaha pe aapne buyer jo hai wo thoda shaitan hai usse contact karna theek nahi hai wo bahut dhamki dene aata hai.
Customer: Sir but buyer ki confirmation ke bina to sir close nahi hoga na concern agar buyer sir ek theek hai main company band kar lunga koi dikkat nahi main trade India se kaam kar lunga okay madam koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Sir jo dusra concern hai wo aapke keh rahe ho resolve ho gaya hai.
Customer: Haan haan ji.
Executive: Ye isme matlab inhone bhi yahi likha hai ki unhone matlab complete unhe nahi mila hai.
Customer: Haan uska attachment attachment deliver nahi hua hai.
Executive: Haan accessories jo hai wo aapne deliver nahi kari hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: To ye kab tak kar denge sir aap?
Customer: Tuesday Wednesday ko ho jayega ye wala.
Executive: Sir dekho Tuesday Wednesday tak aap kar dijiye aur sir dekho hamara purpose ye nahi hai ki aapko pareshan karna ya buyer ko but sir marketplace hai hum agar koi buyer IndiaMART ke through aapke sath juda hai to it's your responsibility ki aap unko acche se baat kare ya acche se unko jo bhi cheez aapne commit kari hai wo deliver kare kyunki sir dekho madam already suniye 100 mein se ek do customer na matlab hum log ka ek do kya bolte hai kaam nahi hai lekin ye jo customer guwahati wali hai na jo October mahina ka complaint ki hui ye aadmi galat hai.
Customer: Kya keh rahe hai?
Executive: Jisko hum log apna bhasha mein bolte hai na ki third class ka insan wo third class ki hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Uska message jo main aapko apne mobile se whatsapp chat dikhaunga na to aap sochenge ki kya ek aurat is tarike se baat kar sakti hai bataye main to unko itna bol diya hu ki aap mera machine wapas kar do madam mujhe aapke sath kaam nahi karna main aap aap mere ko transport ka slip do main paisa RTGS maar deta hu mujhe aapke sath kaam hi nahi karna hai maine already mail bhi dal rakha hai fir bhi wo is tarike se behave kar rahi hai ab customer ke sath main man nahi milne ka bhi to koi reason hota hai na ye customer ganda hai isko do saal ka service dete dete mujhe nani yaad aa jayegi aur do saal mein ye 200 bar block karwayega sab kuch theek hai.
Executive: Sir main samajh rahi hu aapki baat but mera request aapse yahi hai ki please sir dono concerns ko aap apna resolve kar lijiye and uske baad aapki hamari kyunki legal team dekhti hai sir ye sab na to wo legal team ke paas concern escalated hai aap unse coordinate bhi kar lijiye theek hai to ye video meeting aap nahi karna chahte hai video meeting main aapka close kar rahi hu main theek hai sir okay thank you so much sir have a good day sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had concerns regarding video meeting.

- Two buyer conflicts not resolved.

- Service put on hold by IndiaMART.

- Customer says one buyer is abusive.

- Customer says accessories not delivered to another buyer.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to close video meeting ticket.

- Executive requested confirmation for legal team.

- Executive asked customer to coordinate with legal team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will resolve concerns and coordinate with legal team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, complaints, resolution, legal team
